extendedInfo.description: iScore Baseball is the easiest and most intuitive way to track a baseball or softball game. Using Quick Roster, games can be created and scoring can begin in less than a minute. You can score youth baseball/softball, high school games, college games, and even professional games just like the pros."inside the dugouts of amateur, youth and professional teams, another app may rule. iScore Baseball" - NY Times"This is the best baseball scoring application in terms of ease of use and data output." - Boston Herald"iScore Baseball Scorekeeper is about as close to perfection as weâve seen in a digital scorecard" - appolicious.comiScore Baseball allows coaches, parents, and fans to keep a detailed record of the progress of the game. iScore has everything you need to score, track and review a game and your stats.APP FEATURES:â¢ Works on phone devices as well as including optimizations for "xLarge Displays" --- Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy 10.1, etc â¢ Built in iScoreCast and TwitterCast -- Allows friends and family who are unable to attend the game to "watch" in real time from anywhere in the world. The entire game can even be replayed at a later date. (No Video) â¢ Complete Scorekeeping -- Record even the most complex plays. Every stolen base, pick-off and passed ball is tracked.â¢ Complete and Flexible Statistics - Keep cumulative statistics for teams and players - track lifetime stats, season stats, league stats, by tournament --- you decide the groupings that make sense to youâ¢ Pitch Tracker -- Tracks every pitch location, type and speed and includes a speckle chart, allowing you to review pitch history.â¢ Batting Spray Chart -- Track hit locations as well as strength and type giving you an edge over the competitionâ¢ Detailed Scorebook Output -- Beautiful traditional scorebook is automatically generated, even for people that don't know how to keep a scorebook. Invaluable for leagues that require it.â¢ Intuitive Interview Scorekeeping -- No need to learn cryptic ways of tracking a game. Even the most complex plays are scored with ease. Full base runner control means that every stolen base, pick-off and passed ball is tracked. â¢ Multilevel Undo/Redo -- Return to any point in the game, from the first play of the game to the last.â¢ Data Sharing -- Transfer games / teams between devices to save time entering data or to share statistics with others on your team or in your leagueâ¢ Softball Support -- Support for fast pitch softball rules and pitch typesâ¢ Team Manager section -- Manage teams, team rosters and lineup at game time.â¢ Quick Roster -- Generate teams with any number of players.Cumulative and game batting, fielding and pitching statistics as well as detailed scorebook can be viewed at any time during the game. All stats and scorebook can be emailed in EXCEL, CSV, and HTML formats. Coaches will never again have to spend hours trying to extract data from paper records just to see how their players performed.OTHER FEATURES INCLUDE:-Courtesy Runners-DP/Flex support-Support for 10 fielders-International Tie Breaker (any configuration)-Swinging vs Called strike tracking-Intentional Ball tracking-League support (players, teams and games can belong to any number of user defined leagues)-Pitcher Win, Lose, Save tracking-Pitch by Pitch game review-Skip At Bats (assign out or not)-End Inning at any time-End Game at any time-Assign Error at any time to any defensive player (e.g. dropped foul ball for ERA calculations)-Swap Teams -No limit to the number of players or batters in a lineup-ERA9 + ERA based on scheduled innings in games-Export and Import to protect your data from device failure-and so much more...QUESTIONS?We respond very quickly to direct emails at support@iscorecentral.com as well as to our forums at http://iscoreforum.com.TUTORIALS:http://iscorecentral.com/baseball/training.php

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great app, easy to use and far more robust than 6-4-3 in terms of which plays you can score and flexibility to make changes.
reviews.author: David Rising

reviews.title: Awesome, w/ issues
reviews.comment: Most amazing tool to come to a diamond since carbon fiber!! Need to upgrade Twitter cast to show result of each player\'s AB, ex: \"Molly doubles...\" Need to animate plays on iscore to make hits and put outs more exciting... Desperately needs update in buttons. No more white font on white buttons...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nice app. My complaint is that it doesn\'t support coach pitch very well.  In our league coach pitch after 4 walks and full time 5th inning and above or if kids hit two batters in one inning. Also find it to time consuming to adjust to batting order changes.  I\'ve only used it for 5 games so far.  Still looking into stats to track my son\'s putching per game.  But still the best app I\'ve used like it
reviews.author: Mike Stone

reviews.comment: A great tool for keeping score and fantastic support forum
reviews.author: Orlando Rubio

reviews.title: Great app but it keeps crashing. !
reviews.comment: This app has everything I wanted when it comes to keeping score and my team stats, but it crashes almost every time I try to open it. I wish the developers would address this issue. If they do i would gladly give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Adward Salazar

reviews.title: Great needs one or two more options
reviews.comment: Great app, my only complaint would be that the android version needs to have the option for a lighter background, this is available on iOS but I can\'t seem to be able to do it on the Android app
reviews.author: Wayne Talbot

reviews.title: Crashes alllll the time
reviews.comment: Every time I open it it crashes 3 to 4 times before finally working and it slows down my phone. First on my HTC Amaze and now on my Samsung 4.  Next time I\'m using something else. Don\'t waste your money on this!
reviews.author: Weston Defoor

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: For a first timer it is awesome and makes scoring easy. Thanks
reviews.author: Kris Ranes

reviews.title: Best i\'ve found
reviews.comment: Softball scoring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Easy as ABC 123.
reviews.author: John Barbosa

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app just needs to be able to run reports on dates and not just leafues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: takes a little getting used to but works great
reviews.author: Mike Crampton

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is the best stat program I have ever had
reviews.author: justin howe

reviews.comment: Way more than expected. Switched from game changer to this.
reviews.author: Ashley Aoki

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I mainly use this on the Samsung Galaxy tab 2 but it works well on the HTC EVO as well. So far there are no complaints. I use this about the times a week for my kids teams (baseball/softball) and it works great!
reviews.author: Justin C. Benjamin

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Overall this is the best score keeping app that I have used.  I would like to be able to break down the stats to a certain time frame. And to be fair this app may do that.  I still find things that it will do that I wasn\'t aware of
reviews.author: Gary Grissom

reviews.title: GREAT scoring app!
reviews.comment: I use this app to keep score a maintain stats for my daughter\'s softball teams.  It is very easy to use and is extremely customizable as to what stats to keep and view.  The hitter spray chart is a great tool that automatically reminds you of what each opposing hitter did her last plate appearance.  Also, the automatic live scoring and Twitter feed is nice for family and friends interrested in the game, but cannot actually attend, without any extra work on your part.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app..worth the purchase
reviews.comment: Used this for an entire season......a lot of work, but great feedback from coaches and parents.
reviews.author: Ed D\'Hondt

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Have used this to score exclusively in two tournaments now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a great tool for coaches, parents, and players.
reviews.author: Brandon Huesman
